text: UAllâh Akanakuze Awayeke amakholwa kule meko nikuyo ngoku, de Abahlule abo bazizingcoli kwabanyulu. Engekhe uAllâh Atyhile kuni iimfihlelo zokungabonwayo kodwa uAllâh ukhetha kubaThunywa baKhe lowo Athande ukumkhetha. Ke ngoko kholwani kuAllâh nakubaThunywa baKhe. Kananjalo ukuba niyakholwa niMoyike uAllâh; uya kubamkhulu umvuzo wenu
